dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new experiences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on bold challenges, seeking excitement and pushing boundaries.
Your FarTwin will approach new experiences with trepidation, preferring to analyze risks before acting.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing, seeking to minimize expenses and maximize returns.
Your FarTwin will focus on enjoying life's comforts and indulgences, prioritizing experiences over material possessions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be drawn to hands-on experiences and practical applications, seeking to learn by doing.
Your FarTwin will focus on analyzing data, research, and theoretical frameworks to gain a deeper understanding of topics.

dimensions.label: Digital Dependency
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be heavily reliant on digital devices, using them to stay informed and connected.
Your FarTwin will seek to minimize their use of technology, preferring face-to-face interactions and analog experiences.

dimensions.label: Social Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in social settings, actively seeking out new relationships and connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate gatherings, recharging after each interaction.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their schedule?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to take on ambitious projects and meet tight deadlines, maximizing productivity.
Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and spontaneity, avoiding rigid time constraints and embracing a more laid-back approach.

dimensions.label: Humor Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle stress or awkward situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use humor as a coping mechanism, employing wry observations and sarcasm to diffuse tension.
Your FarTwin will employ more overtly playful approaches, using laughter and lightheartedness to lighten the mood.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin weigh options?

options.description: Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, making decisions based on gut feelings and emotional resonance.
Your FarTwin will rely on data, analysis, and objective criteria to make informed decisions.
